# toolkit 1.0.0 (2024-09-19)
- Add functions `r fun_links(c("compare_categorical", "compare_numerical", "combine_table", "zpvalue"), pkgname)`

# toolkit 1.0.1 (2024-09-20)

- Revise function `r fun_links("print_table",pkgname)` such that it can break a long table into multiple columns.

# toolkit 1.0.2 (2024-10-13)

# toolkit 1.0.3 (2024-10-13)
